amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available by this Act is hereby reduced by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 22 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the level of funding in the bill by 1 percent across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A072) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 271 (Roll no. 398).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A072) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 271 (Roll no. 398).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A072) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
